name: Archon Deathmatch
description:
A game made for Unreal Engine's March 2016 game jam, based on the theme "The Sky is the Limit".

It's multiplayer deathmatch between flying angels who shoot fireballs, feathers and laser beams.

You or one of your friends will need to host a server in order to play.

To host a listen server, you need to have port 7777 open.

You join servers by IP, so you need to know the IP of the server. Game clients do not need to open any ports.

This is an old project reuploaded to itch.io to have all my game jam games conveniently in one place. There are no plans to continue development.
